thread.title: 5 quotes from Zuma foreign policy press conference
thread.title_full: 5 quotes from Zuma foreign policy press conference | News24

author: news24.com
title: 5 quotes from Zuma foreign policy press conference
text:
Johannesburg - President Jacob Zuma took to the podium at the Sefako Makgatho Presidential Guest House in Pretoria on Tuesday, where he addressed a wide range of foreign policy topics before an audience of media, diplomats, ambassadors and high commissioners based in South Africa.
Here are five pertinent statements on different subjects made by the president.
1. On Syria - "It took the painful drowning of a... Syrian child to shake the world into action. Attempts to shut borders by some European countries will not assist the situation."
2. On Libya - "I'm sure it will be appropriate our excellencies to underline this point because you all recall that before the Arab Spring and before the killing of Gaddafi, there were no refugees flying or flocking to the European countries."
